name: Gold Gym
description: Gold Gym Academy was founded in 2002 as a pioneer professional Fitness Educational Academy with a solid foundation for health and fitness education, knowledge, techniques and philosophy.

name: Silver Gym
description: Silver Gym is a No Judgment Gym that believes in making serious exercise fun by fusing fitness and entertainment. Join Crunch for all your fitness needs!

name: Navy Gym
description: Navy Gym is an experience for the pure love for fitness, music, art and design on 3500 m². We designed it down to the smallest detail for you. Get your body in shape: functional, cardio, live classes, group workouts or swimming. Yes, there is even a wellness area with saunas, jacuzzis and a pool.

name: Maroon Gym
description: The most flexible sports and wellness gym in Berlin. Train when and where you want, indoor, outdoor and online. Choose from 50+ sport types and wellness offers. Discounts valid only for new customers. Cannot be combined with other discounts.

name: Magenta Gym
description: Magenta in the heart of Berlin! Whether cardio, functional training or swimming in the pool - our varied and design-oriented training areas allow you to have your own personal feel-good space. High-quality equipment, a spacious outdoor area with equipment and support from qualified trainers offer you optimal opportunities for an efficient and effective workout.

name: Grey Gym
description: Grey Gym is all about movement and targeted fitness training are seen as prerequisites for health, performance and well-being. In addition to all common devices such as cardio bikes and dumbbells and barbells, 24 courses complete the offer. For the youngest athletes among us there are children's courses in sports such as judo, karate and dance.

name: Violet Gym
description: Violet Gym offers a personalised fitness program that is developed that works on the principle of super-compensation. The personal advisors work out the training and nutrition plans according to the rule of thumb of 40 percent training, 40 percent nutrition and 20 percent relaxation.

name: Purple Gym
description: The training area is 1,200 square meters and leaves nothing to be desired with all possible fitness equipment. Large changing rooms with modern showers ensure a feel-good factor before and after training. Cardio and equipment training costs EUR 6.25 per week for annual members. Additional fees have to be paid for the use of the sauna and solarium, but these are reasonable.

name: Grape Gym
description: The studio is equipped with equipment from the internationally leading company Technogym, which impresses with its modern design, good biomechanics and innovative usability. Various courses are offered on weekdays. The program ranges from abs, legs, bottom and back to yoga and Pilates. At Grape, older women receive individual support and a training plan specially tailored to their needs.

name: Amethyst Gym
description: Amethyst Gym offers programs in to cover the areas of skin tightening, body shaping and weight loss, there are special programs based on the latest sport-physiological and nutritional knowledge. The speed training is then carried out twice a week for 30 minutes. As a special feature, electrical muscle stimulators are used in the exercises, which accelerate the training effect.

name: Yucca Boulder
description: Bouldering may be the most effective full-body workout. This rope-free form of indoor climbing trains the core, arms, legs, hips...basically the entire body as it ascends the wall and defies gravity. Because every step on a bouldering wall is different, each movement engages a different muscle group, all the while improving your coordination by forcing you to maintain your balance. But there’s more: bouldering increases your heart rate, improving cardiovascular health and, because of all the concentration and mental calculation involved, new research suggests that it may even make you smarter!

name: Palm Boulder
description: In Palm Boulder we offer you the experience of real bouldering as it ascends the wall and resists gravity, this rope-free style of indoor climbing exercises the core, arms, legs, hips...basically the entire body. Because each step on a bouldering wall is unique, each action utilizes a new muscle group, boosting your coordination by requiring you to maintain your balance. But there's more: bouldering raises your heart rate, which improves cardiovascular health, and new study shows that since it requires so much focus and mental calculation, it may even make you smarter!

name: Leaf Boulder
description: Leaf Boulder is one of these facilities that offers only just fun time, in Leaf Boulder, Bouldering is climbing without ropes up to a height from which you can still jump off. For safety, you land on thick mats. This isn’t only reassuring for the climbers, but also for mums and dads watching their clambering offspring.

name: Monstera Boulder
description: In Monstera Boulder facility, Bouldering Experience are like these cliffs at the park have more bouldering than climbing. Students also can get to know other climbers in an informal environment. There are free self-guided hikes and bouldering activities.

name: Dracaena Boulder
description: Dracaena Boulder is one of these facilities that solely provides a great time. Bouldering in Dracaena Boulder involves climbing without ropes up to a height from which you may still leap off. You land on thick mats for safety. This is reassuring not only for the climbers, but also for the parents who are watching their children clamber.

name: Aloe Vera Boulder
description: This rope-free method of indoor climbing strengthens the core, arms, legs, hips...basically the complete body. Because each step on a bouldering wall is unique, each motion requires you to maintain your balance, which improves your coordination. But there's more: bouldering elevates your heart rate, which improves cardiovascular health, and a new study suggests that it may even make you smarter since it involves so much attention and mental calculation!

name: Cactus Boulder
description: Bouldering Experiences at Monstera Boulder are similar to these cliffs at the park, with more bouldering than climbing. Students can also meet other climbers in a casual setting. There are self-guided treks and bouldering activities available for free.

name: Rubber Boulder
description: Bouldering has the potential to be the most effective full-body workout. As it ascends the wall and resists gravity, this rope-free style of indoor climbing exercises the core, arms, legs, hips...basically the entire body. Because each step on a bouldering wall is unique, each action utilizes a new muscle group, boosting your coordination by requiring you to maintain your balance. But there's more: bouldering raises your heart rate, which improves cardiovascular health, and new study shows that since it requires so much focus and mental calculation, it may even make you smarter!

name: Ficus Boulder
description: One of these establishments that only offers fun is Ficus Boulder. Climbing without ropes up to a height from which you can still leap off is known as bouldering in Ficus Boulder. For safety, you land on substantial matting. This is comforting for everyone, including the climbers and the parents who are watching their kids clamber.

name: Pothos Boulder
description: In Pothos Boulder we offer you the experience of real bouldering as it ascends the wall and resists gravity, this rope-free style of indoor climbing exercises the core, arms, legs, hips...basically the entire body. Because each step on a bouldering wall is unique, each action utilizes a new muscle group, boosting your coordination by requiring you to maintain your balance. But there's more: bouldering raises your heart rate, which improves cardiovascular health.

name: Oak Climbing
description: The climbing hall in Oak Climbing offers with its 3000 m 2 space for lots of climbing fun at a safe jumping height. Its organic wall structure enables tricky climbing in vertical to heavily overhanging walls and the free-standing block in the centre of the hall, the "Dicke Berta", ensures the summit experience. Whether with friends or alone, whether athletic or filigree climbing, movement problems of all levels of difficulty can be solved here.

name: Pine Climbing
description: With its 1500 m2 of space, Pine Climbing's climbing wall provides plenty of climbing enjoyment at a secure leaping height. Its naturally occurring wall structure makes it possible to climb up difficult, vertical to severely overhanging walls, and the free-standing block in the middle of the room guarantees a summit experience. Movement issues of all levels of difficulty can be resolved here, whether with friends or family, whether through athletics or filigree climbing.

name: Nutmeg Climbing
description: A special training area enables ambitious climbers to do targeted system training. The friendly atmosphere invites you to linger. While the children find their way into climbing at the "Dragon Rock", you can spend your time relaxing with a coffee and a healthy treat. With more than 1000 m2 and up to 15 meters high.

name: Teak Climbing
description: Aspiring climbers have access to a 750 square meter training facility that is 15 meters high. You are urged to stay awhile by the welcoming ambiance. You can unwind with a cup of coffee and a nutritious treat as the kids learn how to climb at the kid rock.

name: Rosewood Climbing
description: The climbing hall in Rosewood hall offers with its 2400 m 2 space for lots of climbing fun at a safe jumping height. Its organic wall structure enables tricky climbing in vertical to heavily overhanging walls and the free-standing block in the centre of the hall, the "Dicke Berta", ensures the summit experience. Whether with friends or alone, whether athletic or filigree climbing, movement problems of all levels of difficulty can be solved here.

name: Banyan Climbing
description: With its 1700 m2 of space, Banyan Climbing's climbing wall provides plenty of climbing enjoyment at a secure leaping height. Its naturally occurring wall structure makes it possible to climb up difficult, vertical to severely overhanging walls, and the free-standing block in the middle of the room guarantees a summit experience. Movement issues of all levels of difficulty can be resolved here, whether with friends or family, whether through athletics or filigree climbing.

name: Palm Climbing
description: amateur climbers have access to a 950 square meter training facility that is 15 meters high. You are urged to stay awhile by the welcoming ambiance. You can unwind with a cup of coffee and a nutritious treat as the kids learn how to climb at the kid rock.

name: Birch Climbing
description: The climbing hall in Rosewood hall offers with its 2400 m 2 space for lots of climbing fun at a safe jumping height. Its organic wall structure enables tricky climbing in vertical to heavily overhanging walls and the free-standing block in the centre of the hall, the "Dicke Berta", ensures the summit experience. Visit us and get to the peak!

name: Elm Climbing
description: A unique training area enables ambitious climbers to do targeted system training. The friendly atmosphere invites you to linger. While the children find their way into climbing at the "Mountain", you can spend your time relaxing with a coffee and Breakfast/Launch.

name: Spruce Climbing
description: For Professional climbers have access to a 1900 square meter training facility that is 20 meters high. You are urged to stay awhile by the welcoming ambiance. You can unwind with a cup of coffee and a nutritious treat as the kids learn how to climb at the kid rock.

name: Starfish Swimming
description: if anything is missing in Berlin, it's the sea. The river that runs through the city, the Spree, can only slightly make up for this lack. But kids love splashing around in the water. The wave pool in the Starfish swimming pool gives youngsters an idea of the force of nature before they go on a trip to the coast by the sea or even the ocean.

name: Turtle Swimming
description: The fun pool at Turtle offers swimmers a heated 28°C pool of 50 metres. There is a separate pool with a slide for those who want to learn it. Various saunas, showers, rest rooms, and an outdoor area are ideal for relaxation. Every Wednesday, the sauna is for women only.

name: Tuna Swimming
description: Relax in the 36 degree warm water or let yourself be pampered in the wellness area: The LIQUIDROM is a paradise of heat, water and music and is perhaps one of the most unusual locations in the city. The noble materials and the minimalist architecture offer the perfect setting to leave the outside world behind for a few hours.

name: Penguin Swimming
description: Berlin’s first indoor surfing centre, opened in 2019, when experienced and wannabe surfers will be able catch a wave in the capital city. Alongside the nine-metre-wide, indoor citiwave surf wave, there’s a lifestyle restaurant, a surf shop, a mixology bar, a motorbike factory, a beer garden and a surfboard workshop.

name: Whale Swimming
description: The pool has a 50-metre pool (26°C), a non-swimmer area (28°C) with a slide, a wading pool, and a therapy pool (33°C). There is a special happy hour fee at a reasonable price for early birds and for working out. The offer is valid for 90 minutes between 6:30am to 8:00am or 8:30pm to 10:00pm.

name: Shrimp Swimming
description: Designed for the 2000 Olympics, the Europaportpark often hosts international competitions. Although the International Olympic Committee decided in favour of Sydney at the time, the SSE is still the largest swimming pool in Europe with a water area of 3391 square metres.

name: Seahorse Swimming
description: The swimming pool as 50-metre lanes, diving boards of various heights, and a wading pool. In the solarium you can get as tanned as you were on your last holiday. The restaurant offers delicious snacks for when you get hungry.

name: Shark Swimming
description: Relax at Shark pool in the 36 degree warm water or let yourself be pampered in the wellness area. A special feature of the pool: Mermaiding. In selected pools, Berlin pools make the dream of many girls come true. Being a mermaid! The workshops are held on certain dates and must be booked in advance.

name: Clownfish Swimming
description: Clownfish has had a stainless steel pool since the 80’s: a 25-metre pool with diving tower and a no swimming area. Swimming lessons and aqua fitness are offered. The wheelchair accessible sauna area is maintained in an exotic Arabic style: dry and wet sauna, Russian/Roman steam bath, massages, sauna garden, solariums and a bistro. In the entrance hall there is a haircutting salon and restaurant.

name: Seal Swimming
description: The pool in the largest community for beginners swimmers and it is ideal for swimming in eight 50 metre lanes. Once you've tired yourself out, you can relax on heated benches and loungers or go to the Bistro for refreshments. Swimming and play equipment can be hired.

name: Phobos Tennis
description: At Phobos, the community is the top priority at this club. Everyone from beginners to elite athletes are warmly welcomed here.

name: Mimas Tennis
description: The 11,000 square-foot facility in the quiet district has 13 tennis courts, can be covered five of which with air-supported structures.

name: Hyperion Tennis
description: The large open air leisure and sports facility in Berlin offers a total of 8 tennis courts with 4 indoor and 4 outdoor courts. There are also squash courts and table tennis tables as well as a bowling alley. Regardless of whether you are a beginner or a professional there is the right type of training facility for everyone here.

name: Peeps Tennis
description: The tennis facility of the Berlin Peeps offers its members and interested ten clay courts, and has a three-span hall. Although the Mitte can be reached in 15 minutes, you can still enjoy complete tranquillity here at the edge of Berlin. Peeps offers a beach and chill-out area as well as a playground for the little tennis stars.

name: Titan Tennis
description: Sport on over 13 000 sq.m, this facility in the North of Berlin offers 5 hall tennis courts with carpet surfaces and rubber granulate dry shake to protect the joints and ensure an optimal bounce. In addition to tennis, on Berlin and Brandenburg’s largest badminton facility you can of course also play badminton, speed badminton and table tennis, or recover from the effort you have just put in by taking a sauna.

name: Titania Tennis
description: Titan is known for it is 10,000 square-foot facility in the quiet district has 15 tennis courts, can be covered five of which with air-supported structures.

name: Triton Tennis
description: The high end open air leisure and sports facility in Triton offers a total of 10 tennis courts with 4 indoor and 4 outdoor courts. There are also squash courts and table tennis tables as well as a bowling alley. Regardless of whether you are a beginner or a professional there is the right type of training facility for everyone here.

name: Callisto Tennis
description: There are a total of 10 tennis courts available at Callisto high-end outdoor recreational and sporting complex, including 4 indoor and 4 outdoor courts. Along with a bowling alley, there are squash courts, table tennis tables, and more. There is the appropriate training facilities available for everyone, whether you are a novice or a professional.

name: Europa Tennis
description: This facility in the middle of Berlin has 4 hall tennis courts with carpet floors and rubber granulate dry shake to preserve the joints and ensure an ideal bounce. The complex is around 11,000 square meters large. On Berlin and Brandenburg's largest badminton facility, you can play tennis in addition to badminton, speed badminton, and table tennis. You may also use a sauna to relax after a hard workout.

name: Tethys Tennis
description: Tethys Tennis Club is renowned for its 10,000 square foot facility, which contains 15 tennis courts, five of which can be covered with air-supported structures.

name: Java Volleyball
description: Since 1976 we have been offering volleyball to anyone interested in Berlin. We have volleyball teams for girls and boys from 8 years, women's and men's teams, as well as leisure groups. We play indoor volleyball and beach volleyball on the club's own fields in the Java Sportpark.

name: Luzon Volleyball
description: At the beginning of the millennium, we have steadily expanded our mixed volleyball department . In 1994, a new training facility was added in the form of the “Luzon” on the hall on Thursdays , where we were able to set up a youth and an adult basic group .

name: Panay Volleyball
description: Next to Volkspark Friedrichshain, there are sandy areas where you can set up several beach fields with a mobile net system. If the weather is good, you should be there early to get a seat. Visit us and we would be very happy about your tips for free beach facilities.

name: Samar Volleyball
description: In Samar Hall there are 2 large volleyball groups that always play at the same time and in the same location. These groups are called “Just Play” and “Lust auf nen Vierer”. These groups can sometimes reach up to 60 participants. They offer a great opportunity to get started in the beach volleyball scene in Berlin.

name: Hainan Volleyball
description: Since 1998 we have been offering volleyball to anyone interested in Berlin. We have volleyball teams for girls and boys from 8 years, women's and men's teams, as well as leisure groups. We play indoor volleyball and beach volleyball on the club's own fields in Hainan.

name: Aruba Volleyball
description: With Aruba, registration always starts in the week on Tuesday and does not have a specific time. A post is created on the website and everyone who wants to play on Sunday must register on the website as soon as possible. The post usually appears around 4-5 p.m. The first ~ 50 places then get a right to play. You have to be very quick to register, the places are often gone within 2-3 hours.

name: Anquilla Volleyball
description: Anguilla offers three halls and mostly a relatively large group with a similar level of play (A1-F1) is the JustPlay beach volleyball group. It takes place on a weekly basis. Registration can be done by telephone and is accepted starting from Monday of the respective week.

name: Grenada Volleyball
description: Are you new to Berlin or just visiting for a short time and looking for strong beach volleyball partners or opponents. You can book through space, with some information e.g. how many DVV points you have or which tournaments you have already played and we will help you. In order to network good players.

name: Dominica Volleyball
description: In the volleyball department of Dominica Berlin, we now play leisure volleyball in five groups. The teams are mixed and have different levels. We do not have playgroups with only men or women. In the summer months, we offer our members the opportunity to play volleyball regularly.

name: Cayman Volleyball
description: In Cayman there are 4 large halls, mostly on the weekend there are more than 3 volleyball groups that always play at the same time and in the same location. These groups can sometimes reach up to 60 participants. They offer a great opportunity to get started in the beach volleyball scene in Berlin.

name: Lion MMA
description: Many people train at Lion MMA Berlin, who have previously trained for years in other martial arts (kickboxing, Thai boxing, boxing, jiu-jitsu, judo, fitness kickboxing, K-1, wrestling...) and join us at an advanced level. Here we care mostly about the community and how martial arts can bring people together.

name: Lynx MMA
description: Lynx MMA was founded in 2010 as a training facility that is focused on mixed martial arts training. Over the last 10 years it has developed itself into a hub for all things martial arts. MMA and the disciplines that form a part thereof are offered almost every day of the week. The disciplines include BJJ, Muay Thai, Boxing and Wrestling.

name: Eagle MMA
description: Mixed martial arts or MMA for short started in the 80s and 90s when martial artists where trying to prove to each other which martial arts style is the best. Suitable for people with no prior MMA experience. MMA beginner classes focus on base techniques like simple punches, kicks or throws.

name: Cheetah MMA
description: At Cheetah, we care about each and every trainer we have, our message is to offer suitable training for people with no knowledge about MMA till they reach a confidence stage, The classes include more difficult techniques and chain together basic techniques to effective combinations. The pace is faster and play sparring is sometimes part of this class.

name: Fox MMA
description: Fox MMA was founded in 2002 as a training facility that is focused on mixed martial arts training. Over the last 20 years it has developed itself into a hub for all things martial arts. MMA and the disciplines that form a part thereof are offered almost every day of the week.

name: Tiger MMA
description: Although, the best MMA athletes from Berlin and the surrounding area belong to the Tiger’s, our offer is primarily aimed at amateur athletes. Thanks to our expertise, every beginner can be sure that the content taught has been proven on the world's largest stages.

name: Leopard MMA
description: In Leopard MMA, we convey a positive experience in dealing with martial arts. The main focus is on giving our clients the tools they need to defend themselves successfully or to survive in the ring. We believe in a balance between functionality and a healthy philosophy when dealing with martial arts.

name: Komodo MMA
description: Many people train at Komodo MMA Berlin, who have previously trained for years in other martial arts (kickboxing, Thai boxing, boxing, jiu-jitsu, judo, fitness kickboxing, K-1, wrestling...) and join us at an advanced level. Here we care mostly about the community and how martial arts can bring people together.

name: Vulture MMA
description: Mixed martial arts started to spread more in the 90s when martial artists where trying to prove to each other which martial arts style is the best. Suitable for people with no prior MMA experience. MMA beginner to classes focus on base techniques like simple punches, kicks or throws. Also above amateur level that want to exceed to professional stage.

name: Panther MMA
description: We present a satisfying martial arts encounter in Panther MMA. Giving our clients the skills they need to effectively defend themselves or endure in the ring is our major goal. When it comes to martial arts, we think there should be a balance between practicality and a sound philosophical foundation.

name: Terra Badminton
description: The tennis facility of the Terra offers its members and interested ten clay courts, and has a three-span hall. Although the Mitte can be reached in 15 minutes, you can still enjoy complete tranquillity here at the edge of Berlin. Peeps offers a beach and chill-out area as well as a playground for the little Badminton stars.

name: Pace Badminton
description: There are a total of 10 Badminton courts available at Pace high-end outdoor recreational and sporting complex, including 4 indoor and 4 outdoor courts. There is the appropriate training facilities available for everyone, whether you are a novice or a professional.

name: Landsat Badminton
description: Are you looking for a little vacation from everyday life? Then you've come to the right place at Landsat! Whether young or old, beginner or professional, the extensive facility offers something for everyone. Landsat badminton offers plenty of space for exercise in the countryside and a large selection of sports activities.

name: Aqua Badminton
description: here at the Aqua you have the opportunity to practice Badminton, either in a team or individually. Take advantage of the huge range of sports to work on your individual skills and at the same time ensure an improved body feeling.

name: Aura Badminton
description: At Aura Berlin, you have the opportunity to play and train badminton together with others in huge and modern halls for competition or just for fun. Here you have the opportunity to improve your badminton skills and achieve your personal training goals. Join the badminton association and experience the joy of sport here!

name: Icesat Badminton
description: Would you like to share your love of badminton with others and are you looking for the perfect place to do so? Then you've come to the right place at Icesat, because here you have the opportunity to train badminton with like-minded people in a motivating atmosphere. Play here in a team and, in addition to normal training sessions, also attend training camps for high-intensity badminton training. Come to Icesat Club and experience the joy of badminton!

name: Prefire Badminton
description: You may play and practice badminton with others at Prefire in spacious, cutting-edge halls for competition or just for enjoyment. You can develop your badminton abilities and meet your individual fitness objectives here. Become a member of the badminton association and enjoy sports!

name: Maia Badminton
description: You can practice badminton here at the Maia, either with a team or on your alone. Utilize the wide variety of activities to hone your specific skills while also ensuring an increased sense of body. At Maia we care about having a community so we can grow together.

name: Pace Badminton
description: Are you seeking for the ideal location to spread your enthusiasm for badminton to others? Then you've found the right location at Pace, where you can train badminton in a motivating environment with others who share your interests. Play here as a team and go to training camps for intense badminton training in addition to regular practice sessions. Visit Pace Club to enjoy the sport of badminton!

name: Calipso Badminton
description: Ten clay courts and a three-span hall are available to Terra members and guests at the tennis facility. Even though it only takes 15 minutes to go to the Mitte, this part of Berlin's outskirts nonetheless offers absolute peace and quiet. Calypso has a playground for the little badminton stars, a beach, and a place to relax.

name: Utopia Kajaking
description: Utopia Berlin is a young company that has been on the market since 2017. Equipped with a broad portfolio, the new and larger location at the Spree Utopia was opened in May 2018. With the first floating SUP stand, Utopia Berlin is setting a new standard in the rental scene.

name: Silver Wave Kajaking
description: With Silver Wave, enjoy unforgettable moments on the water surrounded by breathtaking nature. With our competent crew you can leave everyday life behind and slow down. From bachelor(ette) parties and team events to SUP, boat and kayak rentals or yoga on the lake. Big or small, everyone goes home with us in a good mood.

name: Sea Swag Kajaking
description: Here in the Sea Swag there are ideal conditions for boating: many small streams, no waves, no motorboats, and no wind. Our boats are ideal for these conditions. The proportions of the kayaks and their weight distribution result in good steering performance. The flat, broad bottoms of our boats glide calm and stable through the water.

name: Ocean Kajaking
description: Explore Berlin by canoe while doing sport! With Ocean Berlin, we are inviting you to actively explore the hidden gems of the city by canoe. Whether you’re a visitor or a true Berliner – we guarantee that you`ve never looked at Berlin from this perspective!

name: Crystal Kajaking
description: With Crystal Kajkaing Berlin, enjoy the stunning waterscape of the legendary Landwehrkanal and the Spree River! Discover an unexpected oasis in the middle of the city. Switch of your perspective. Move differntly thru Berlin . It will be a real daydream! With the best equipment – comfortable kayaks, life vests, spray decks – and professional guided in small groups we provide you a unique experience.

name: Escape Kajaking
description: Escape Kayaking promotes strength, endurance, balance and coordination and can be practiced by young and old on the calm Berlin waters. In addition, there is the stay in nature and the nice community of the club. We organize regattas and organize a forest run every year for children and adults. In winter we offer strength and endurance training in the hall.

name: Scorpio Kajaking
description: With Scorpio Kayaking, You will be supervised by 5 trainers. You can train up to three times a week during summer, during winter we have other appointment that gets updated every week depends on the weather. We currently have 130 members. Join us and be part of the community.

name: Pacific Kajaking
description: Enjoy the breathtaking waterscape of the famed Landwehrkanal and the Spree River with Pacific Kajkaing Berlin! Find a hidden refuge in the heart of the metropolis. Change your viewpoint. Differently move across Berlin. A genuine daydream, that will be! We offer you a one-of-a-kind experience with the greatest tools—comfortable kayaks, life jackets, and spray decks—and qualified guides in small groups.

name: Starboard Kajaking
description: Escape kayaking may be done by both young and old on the calm Berlin waters and helps to build strength, endurance, balance, and coordination. The stay in the wilderness and the welcoming club community are additional benefits. Every year, we plan regattas for kids and adults, as well as a forest run. We provide strength and endurance training in the hall during the winter.

name: Coastal Kajaking
description: Explore Berlin by canoe while doing sport! With Costal Kayak, we are inviting you to actively explore the hidden gems of the city by canoe. Whether you’re a visitor or a true Berliner – we guarantee that you've never looked at Berlin from this perspective!
